snippet: The photographer Nicholas Maggio lives in sunny California but prefers a noir look out of the 1930s.
abstract: Los Angeles photographer Nicholas Maggio says his Spanish-style Beverly Hills duplex apartment boasts 70s style with many fascinating objects.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Nicholas Maggio lives in sunny California but prefers a noir look out of the 1930s.

headline.print_headline: Darkness on the Edge of Town
headline.main: A Gloomy, Glamorous Los Angeles Apartment
